selectedVerses.text: And a little later someone else saw him and said, "You also are one of them." But Peter said, "Man, I am not."
There was no end of all the people, all of whom he led. Yet those who come later will not rejoice in him. Surely this also is vanity and a striving after wind.
Now the Spirit expressly says that in later times some will depart from the faith by devoting themselves to deceitful spirits and teachings of demons,
Not many days later, the younger son gathered all he had and took a journey into a far country, and there he squandered his property in reckless living.
The sins of some men are conspicuous, going before them to judgment, but the sins of others appear later.
